humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the sentinel lymph node was negative for malignancy (0/1), and the cytokeratin immunohistochemical stain is also negative. Based on the new rule 11, N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for cancer is determined by the involvement of nearby lymph nodes. In this report, the sentinel node excisional biopsy result is negative for malignancy (0/1), and there is no evidence of lymphovascular invasion. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0, indicating no regional lymph node involvement.
